about_the_game:
Game

This is a simulation game. The player is a caretaker, and his daily job is to take care of the objects in the warehouse.

Each time you start the game, the warehouse will randomly generate different items, and the objects in the warehouse can be interacted with, but there may be some dangers.

When the player completes the test, different plots will appear based on some conditions.

Play

Players need to monitor the objects within the specified time through the monitoring screen.

However, players are overseeing some mysterious objects, and emergencies may occur at any time.

If an emergency occurs, players need to quickly reach the containment room and press the emergency button to eliminate the danger, but they must choose the right button.

Not all of the mysterious objects are dangerous, there are also some interesting objects that can be interacted with or help players.

Players only need to persist for 10 rounds to pass the game test.

Subsequent

The adventure mode will be launched later. There are not many containment objects at present, and some new containment objects will be updated later.

It will take about six months.

If players have good ideas for containing objects, they can leave messages to communicate.

Of course, subsequent updates are free.

name: Monitoring

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ‌Intel Core i5 12600KF / AMD Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ‌Intel Core i5 12600KF / AMD Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a test, players only need to follow the rules to pass the test safely.
